predicate.note: Frames file for 'consummate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No Framenet entry. Comparison with 'complete'.

example.name: passive
example.text: A unit of DPC Acquisition Partners launched a $10-a-share tender offer for the shares outstanding of Dataproducts Corp., and said it would seek to liquidate the computer-printer maker ``as soon as possible,'' even if a merger isn't consummated *trace*.

example.name: hubba hubba
example.text: John wants *trace* to consummate his relationship with Mary, but Mary says it Hades will open a ski resort before that happens.
